description:
Part overalls, part jumpsuit, all simple summer comfort. Made from DU/ER’s easy to love performance denim, this jumpsuit has an effortless stretch that feels great from the moment you put it on.

  • Made from a soft and rugged blend of cotton, Coolmax® polyester, and LYCRA®
  • Coolmax fibres helps wick away moisture and combined with cotton you get improved breathability
  • Dynamic fabric stretches and moves with you
  • Deep front pockets and 2 back pockets leave lots of room for must-haves
  • Zippered front closure makes it easy to step in an out of
  • Relaxed fit keeps things casual and leave room for a sweater on cooler days
name: DU/ER Performance Denim Jumpsuit - Women's
